title: Detroit Metal City (Detroit Metal City: The Animated Series)
synopsis: Dominating the world of indie music, Detroit Metal City (DMC) is a popular death metal band known for its captivatingly dark and crude style. Its extravagant lead singer, Johannes Krauser II, is especially infamous as a demonic being who has risen from the fiery pits of hell itself in order to bring the world to its knees and lord over all mortalsâ€”or at least that's what he's publicized to be.
